category: Regulations on establishment and operation of advisory committee/Article 26 (Education Committee)
contents: Article 26 (Education Committee) The Education Committee shall respond to the chairman's advice on the following matters. 1. Matters pertaining to the future sports education vision and mid- to long-term policy direction 2. Matters pertaining to the establishment and promotion of a comprehensive education plan for athletes 3. Matters pertaining to the development and operation of programs to improve the basic knowledge and abilities of athletes 4. Other functions of the Education Committee Matters deemed to be in compliance and submitted by the chairman [This article was newly established on July 5, 2023]
